name: Go-Vid
description:
A game we Made on our first game jam. You control a grandma and you have to run to the store to get some really needed groceries, but the young folk isn't as healthy as they seem...

Future plans for this game:

As you have probably seen this game is pretty bare-bones and ripe with bugs. For the final vision for this game, we envisioned a survival - action game. 

There will be:

  1. equipment and new safety requirements generated daily. 
  2. Also unlike now, a small city is planed with more unique shops, streets with cars and more.
  3. Much more :)
